io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.input

Interface ControllerInputProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapControllerProvider

    public interface ControllerInputProvider
    A system that provides binding controls for keyboards.
    Author:
    Tomaso2468

    • Method Detail

      • isLeftHanded

        boolean isLeftHanded()
        Determines if the controls are left handed.
        Returns:
        true if the controls are left handed, false otherwise.

      • setLeftHanded

        void setLeftHanded(boolean leftHanded)
        Sets if the controls are left handed.
        Parameters:
        leftHanded - true if the controls are left handed, false otherwise.

      • getBinding

        int getBinding(java.lang.String func)
        Gets the binding for the specified function.
        Parameters:
        func - A function ID.
        Returns:
        A keyboard binding.

      • bind

        void bind(java.lang.String func,
          int button)
        Binds the function to the specified button.
        Parameters:
        func - The function to bind.
        button - The button to bind to.

      • isButtonPressed

        static boolean isButtonPressed(org.newdawn.slick.Input in,
                               int key)
        Determines if the button is pressed.
        Parameters:
        in - The current input.
        key - The button.
        Returns:
        true if the button is pressed, false otherwise.
